title: Account sharing can i do it ?
body:
Hi my name is owen and for the past 5 months i have not been aboul to access the shop.
I have over 50.000 ip and cant use it however wen i loged into my ex mates computer wen i went over there i could use the shop this was about 4 months ago.

SO i would like to know can i give my account details to my mate so i can get champions without being banned?

ps its a new mate

replies.body:
As per the Terms of Use [**OCE TOU**](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse),

>** C. Login Credentials.**  In creating an Account, you will be required to select a unique username and password (collectively, “Login Credentials”), which you will use each time you access the Game.  **You may not share your Account with anyone other than as expressly set forth herein**, and you are entirely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your Login Credentials and for any and all activities (including purchases and charges, as applicable) that are conducted through your Account.  Please notify Riot Games immediately if you become aware of any breach of security, including any loss, theft or unauthorized disclosure of your Login Credentials. 

> **D. Account Sales.**  The Account supplied to you is personal to you, and Riot Games does not recognize and expressly forbids the transfer of user Accounts.  You shall not purchase, sell, gift or trade any Account, or make any such offer. In the event that you attempt to transfer your user Account in contravention of this clause, Riot Games reserves the right to terminate your Account.  Any distribution by you of your Account and/or your Login Credentials (except as expressly provided herein or otherwise explicitly approved of by Riot Games) may result in suspension or termination of your Account. 

Account Sharing is against the Terms of Use and may result in a permanent account suspension. I would highly advise against doing so.
